cause.description:
Whirlow Hall Farm Trust is a charity based on a real working farm on the edge of Sheffield. Nearly 9,000 children a year have an experience they never forget by visiting Whirlow. Inner city children who have never even seen a cow or eaten homecooked food are given these and numerous other opportunites such as riding a pony, growing their own vegetables, exploring nature and gain respite by being allowed to simply 'be'.
IMPORTANT !!! PLEASE DO NOT DONATE THROUGH THE 'DONATE ' BUTTON AS WE HAD TO CHOOSE A RANDOM AMERICAN CHARITY & COULD NOT REGISTER WHIRLOW TO DONATE TO!!! WITHOUT DONATIONS WE WOULD NOT BE ABLE TO CONTINUE THE WORK WE DO WITH SO MANY CHILDREN PLEASE SEE: www.whirlowhallfarm.co.uk for further info and to donate
1. All children should have the opportunity to experience the countryside
2. To reconnect children with where their food comes from
cause.mission: allow inner city & additional needs children and adults to gain a meaningful hands on experience in the countryside, teaching them where food comes from and how to care for animals
cause.name: Whirlow Hall Farm
